pricingFaq.title: Pricing FAQ
pricingFaq.subtitle: Common questions about our pricing plans

items.question: Can I change my plan later?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time. Contact us via WhatsApp for assistance with plan changes.

items.question: Is there a setup fee?
items.answer: No, there are no setup fees or hidden charges. The price you see is exactly what you pay.

items.question: How do I pay?
items.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit cards, PayPal, and cryptocurrency. Contact us via WhatsApp to discuss payment options.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
items.answer: All sales are final. No refunds or exchanges are provided after payment. Please contact us before purchasing if you have any questions about our service.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our IPTV service

items.question: Why is my stream buffering?
items.answer: Buffering can occur due to slow internet connection, network congestion, or device limitations. Ensure you have a stable internet connection of at least 10 Mbps for HD streaming and 25 Mbps for 4K content.

items.question: How many devices can I use simultaneously?
items.answer: Our IPTV service supports multiple simultaneous connections. The exact number depends on your subscription plan. Contact us via WhatsApp for specific details about your plan.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit cards, PayPal, and cryptocurrency. Contact us via WhatsApp to discuss payment options for your region.

items.question: Which devices are supported?
items.answer: Our service works on Smart TVs (Samsung/LG), MAG boxes, Android TV/Box, iOS/Android devices, Enigma receivers, PCs, Kodi, VLC, Fire TV Stick, Apple TV, and more.

items.question: Do you offer a free trial?
items.answer: We do not offer free trials or refunds. All sales are final to maintain our competitive pricing and instant service activation. Contact us for any questions before purchasing.

items.question: How quickly will my service be ready?
items.answer: Your IPTV service will be ready within 5-7 minutes after payment confirmation. You'll receive all necessary setup information via WhatsApp.

guarantee.title: No Refund Policy
guarantee.content: All sales are final. Once payment is completed, no refunds or exchanges will be provided under any circumstances. Please ensure you understand our service before making a purchase.

eligibility.title: No Exceptions Policy
eligibility.intro: This no-refund policy applies to all circumstances including:
conditions: Dissatisfaction with content or channel availability
Changes in personal circumstances or needs
Inability to use the service on your devices

process.title: Before You Purchase
process.intro: To ensure you're satisfied with your purchase, please:
steps: Contact our support team via WhatsApp at +1 (332) 266-2387 for any questions
Verify that our service is compatible with your devices
Understand that all sales are final once payment is processed
Ensure you have a stable internet connection for optimal streaming

timeline.title: Payment Processing
timeline.content: All payments are processed immediately upon completion. Once your payment is confirmed, your IPTV service will be activated within 5-7 minutes. This policy ensures quick service activation and maintains our competitive pricing.

exclusions.title: Why This Policy
exclusions.intro: This no-refund policy allows us to:
items: Maintain competitive pricing for our premium IPTV services
Provide instant service activation within minutes
Invest in high-quality servers and content delivery
Offer 24/7 customer support for technical assistance

contact.title: Need Help?
contact.content: If you have any questions about our no-refund policy or need technical assistance with your service, please contact our support team before making a purchase.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
